content: 教育科学出版社学习要点 . - How do you go to school? - I go to school by car. . - How long does it take to go to school? - It takes about 20 minutes. . - Why don ’ t you take the bus? - That’s a good idea. . - What time do you get up? - I get up at 7:30. . - What are you doing? - I’m getting dressed in my room. . - Did you wash your hands? - Yes, I did. . - What did you do after school? - I saw a movie after school. . - When’s your birthday? - My birthday is on September second. - What’s the date today? - It’s September first. . - What do you want to buy her? - I want to buy her a teddy bear. . - What color do you want? - I want a blue shirt. - How do you like this one? - Well, I don’t like it. I want a shirt without buttons. . Show me a bigger one, please. . - What’s he wearing? - He’s wearing a red jacket. . What a beautiful hairpin! . How about buying a new car? Where Are You from?
